      • panBy

        public static void panBy​(MapRenderer3 renderer,
                         float tx,
                         float ty,
                         IMapRendererEnums.CameraCollision collide,
                         boolean animate)
        Pan the map a given number of pixels. Screen position is interpreted as upper-left origin.
        Parameters:
        tx - Horizontal pixels to pan
        ty - Vertical pixels to pan
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false

        Parameters:

        origin - The screen origin location
        animate - Pan smoothly if true; immediately if false
